long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Enables automatic next page loading (aka infinite scroll) on product listings of the Cool Blue webstores (www.coolblue.nl).

To activate the plugin just go to the specific webstore (eg www.laptopshop.nl) and click  the extension icon to grant access to the website data.

Check the results on any products category page.
